actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.

actions.subcommittee: National Parks, Forests and Public Lands
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks, Forests, and Public Lands

official_title: For the relief of Thomas McDermott, Sr.

summary.text: Authorizes a named individual to purchase at fair market value specified Federal real property in Grant County, New Mexico, to which such individual's mineral patent application applies. Directs the Bureau of Land Management to enter into negotiations with such individual for the purchase of such property.

titles.title: For the relief of Thomas McDermott, Sr.
